results.content: The quality of this course was higher than that of the previous one and it made following along really clear and nice. The instructor seems knowledgeable but lacks a good way of explaining "why" something does something. Instead of simply stating "use -c to do X", try and explain what "-c" stands for/means so the user can better remember that value. Saying things is one thing, teaching its purpose is another. Also, this course was a lot smaller than the previous one, and covered much similar territory. Granted, it did go a bit further in depth on a lot of these concepts. It still lacked having exercise problems (except 1) and even that one required you to understand the "|" command when that was never taught. Overall I learned a what I needed to without too much difficulty (hence the higher rating), but relative to the other course it was much less content and many of the issues carried over.

results.content: Instructor was well informative. I would suggest if there could be some drills or exercises  in between different sessions, the class would  be more interesting.
results.content_html: Instructor was well informative. I would suggest if there could be some drills or exercises in between different sessions, the class would be more interesting.
